title: Christmas cake present
description: Why not give both a cake and present this Christmas? Wrapped up in a traditional double layer of marzipan and fondant, and finished off with gingerbread biscuit tags, this fruit cake makes the perfect present. Fresh holly and mini baubles can also add another decorative festive flourish.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz mixed dried fruit, such as sultanas, raisins and currants
150ml/5fl oz brandy, plus optional extra to ‘feed’ the cake
½ orange, finely grated zest and juice only
3 tbsp black treacle or date syrup, optional
gingerbread gift tags, optional (see recipe in link)
